overview: An X-rated magazine sponsored a contest to determine who's the sexiest girl in San Francisco. After an exhaustive and deep probing search, an ace reporter sniffs out two sizzling strumpets who'll do anything for the $50,000 prize money in a no-holds-barred Carnal Olympics. Event number one finds each team in a very hot girl-girl love making event where the judges give the gals a ten on technique alone. Event number two has each girl seducing an officer of the law in a hard-driving shoot out of a very personal nature. In the final and decisive event number three, a not-to-be-believed pool party turns into an orgy of truly Olympian proportions where everyone turns out to be a wild, wild winner.

production_companies.name: Hollywood International Film Corp. Of America

title: Carnal Olympics
